name: Pray And Spray
description:
Pray And Spray.
It's simple.
Grab a gun and hope for the best.
Pray And Spray is an online first person action shooter. Place yourself right in the center of warfare! Red vs. Blue! 3 game modes to start! Play Team Deathmatch, Free For All or Capture The Loot with your friends! Battle it out on the most realistic and bizarre levels! Tons of weapons waiting to be used on the kill floor! Step into the arena today and show off your skills!
